content:
After the new benchmarks were added with specific versions, it seems to me that the readability of the compare page has regressed slightly, because of all of the version numbers:
image.png

What about hiding the version numbers by default and only showing them on hover?
As a related readability improvement, maybe Profile should have its own separate column, same as Scenario?
I agree about the Profile column, but the version numbers seem ok to me
Actually having the profile together with the name probably bothers me more than the version. I'll split it.
Although this is blocked on the Vue3 upgrade.
